Package org.ivoa.dm.measurement

package org.ivoa.dm.measurement
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Asymmetrical1D
    Uncertainty with different extent in the positive and negative directions from the associated Coordinate.
    Asymmetrical1D.Asymmetrical1DBuilder
    A builder class for Asymmetrical1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Asymmetrical2D
    2D Uncertainty with different extent in the positive and negative axis directions from the associated Coordinate.
    Asymmetrical2D.Asymmetrical2DBuilder
    A builder class for Asymmetrical2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Asymmetrical3D
    3D Uncertainty with different extent in the positive and negative axis directions from the associated Coordinate.
    Asymmetrical3D.Asymmetrical3DBuilder
    A builder class for Asymmetrical3D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Bounds1D
    Provide the edges of the uncertainty space.
    Bounds1D.Bounds1DBuilder
    A builder class for Bounds1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Bounds2D
    Provide the edges of a 2D uncertainty space.
    Bounds2D.Bounds2DBuilder
    A builder class for Bounds2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Bounds3D
    Provide the edges of a 3D uncertainty space.
    Bounds3D.Bounds3DBuilder
    A builder class for Bounds3D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Ellipse
    Elliptical uncertainty shape.
    Ellipse.EllipseBuilder
    A builder class for Ellipse, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Ellipsoid
    Ellipsoidal uncertainty shape.
    Ellipsoid.EllipsoidBuilder
    A builder class for Ellipsoid, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Error
    The Error class uses the Uncertainty types to describe measurement errors from various sources.
    Error.ErrorBuilder
    A builder class for Error, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    GenericMeasure
    The most generic Measure class.
    GenericMeasure.GenericMeasureBuilder
    A builder class for GenericMeasure, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    MeasModel
     
    MeasModel.References
     
    Measure
    Abstract base of Measure classes, associates a 'determined value' (Coordinate) with corresponding errors.
    Polarization
    Provides a complete description of a determined polarization state.
    Polarization.PolarizationBuilder
    A builder class for Polarization, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Position
    Provides a complete description of a measured positional instant.
    Position.PositionBuilder
    A builder class for Position, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    ProperMotion
    Proper motion represented as the velocity in Longitude and Latitude directions of a spherical coordinate space.
    ProperMotion.ProperMotionBuilder
    A builder class for ProperMotion, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Symmetrical
    Symmetrical uncertainty, constant in all dimensions and directions from the associated Coordinate.
    Symmetrical.SymmetricalBuilder
    A builder class for Symmetrical, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Time
    Provides a complete description of a measured Temporal instant.
    Time.TimeBuilder
    A builder class for Time, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Uncertainty
    Abstract head of uncertainty types.
    Velocity
    Provides a comple description of a measured Velocity instant.
    Velocity.VelocityBuilder
    A builder class for Velocity, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
